import React from "react"; import { Button, CloseButton, Modal, Badge} from "react-bootstrap"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faCirclePlus, faTrash, faPencil } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import './ModalDetail.css' const BadgeStatus = ({ values }) => { let color; switch (values) { case "Active": color = "success" break; case "Inactive": color = "danger" break; case "Trial": color = "warning" break; } return ( <> {values} ); }; function ModalDetail({isOpen, hideModal, dataModal}){ return( <> Student
Upload Photo

Student ID:

Fullname:

Birth Date:

Signup Date:

Family contact:

Parent email:

Phone number:

Student status:

{dataModal.id}

{dataModal.fullname}

{dataModal.birthday}

{dataModal.signupdate}

{dataModal.familycontact}

{dataModal.parenemail}

{dataModal.phonenumber}

{/*

Question:
{dataModal.question}

Answer:
{dataModal.answer}

*/}

Courses Purchased

{dataModal.course && dataModal.course.map((c, i) => (

{c.name}

))}

Term

{dataModal.course && dataModal.course.map((c, i) => (

{c.term}

))}
); } export default ModalDetail
